name: LepreChess
description:
!!! please read the description before playing !!!

A chess inspired turn-based puzzle game

The enemies will always pick the move closest to you so maybe sometimes they wont be very smart. 

There are two enemies the Goblin that acts like the knight from chess:

 and the Mushroom that acts like the rook:

Only one enemy can move per turn.  The catch is that all enemies are invisible and you can only see where they were in the beginning and which one is actually moving, but you cant see where its moving. You can also use cards to help you survive.

Controls - just left clicking...

Programming - McPeverick 

Game Design - Sakata/McPeverick 

Music - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/8-bit-adventure/2282

Artist - Sakata

We tried getting the webGL build to work but it behaves differently in the browser.
